name: Avoid using plain END statement, use the explained END statement like ENDIF, ENDDO, etc  (RPG400)
description: This rule searches all the artifacts using plain END statements.
output:
This report lists RPG400 programs using plain END statement, use the explained END statement like ENDIF, ENDDO, etc.
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Program full name
rationale: This increases the level of readability of the code and hence the maintainability
remediation: Try to replace the plain END with the explained one like END IF, END DO etc
alternativeName: Avoid using plain END statement, use the explained END statement like ENDIF, ENDDO, etc  (RPG400)
